headline: ATLAS ELECTRIC DEVICES ACCELERATED SUNLITE EXPOSURE TESTING SYSTEM
description: Accelerated Sunlite Exposure Testing System      AS IS, WHERE IS
specstable:
Manufacturer Atlas Electric
Model SC1
Description Accelerated Sunlite Exposure Testing System
Accessories

Atlas multimonitor:
Temperature and irradiance monitoring and control
Sensors:

  • Black standard thermometer
  • White panel thermometer
    Programmable flooding for cyclic sample immersion throughout test program
    Flooding option not included
Other Information


Light source: 1500 watt xenon arc lamp
Temperature range: 40 to 90°C
Temperature control: Adjustable set point
Programmable countdown timer
Wattage range: 1000 to 3200
Wattage continuously adjustable 5 to 16 amps
Irradiance monitoring:

  • Narrow band 340nm, 420nm
  • Wide band 295 to 400nm
    Exposure area 500 square cm
    New xenon lamp included
    Two extra lamps
    More info available
Condition Excellent
Year of Manufacture 1992
Power Requirements 220 V 17.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Depth 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Height 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Weight 75 lb (34 kg)
